dialogue.text: It happened five or six times. I remember it because every time the door appeared, I felt like vanishing.

psychological_notes: The repetition (5-6 times) suggests the psyche's insistence on this passage. The feeling of vanishing represents ego death - not physical death but the dissolution of false self. The worry is natural when facing one's own disappearance.
philosophical_underpinning: To pass through certain doors, we must be willing to cease existing as we know ourselves
therapeutic_direction: Approaching the terror and liberation of ego dissolution
